name: ManageSoftwareCatalogEntity
description:
Create or update entities in the Software Catalog.

Use this tool to either create a new entity or update an existing one within the Software Catalog in Datadog.

parameters.name: entity_data
parameters.description: Entity data in YAML or JSON format to create or update in the Software Catalog.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.
